website_summaries.verdict: A lower-cost cast iron braiser of decent quality.
pros: Available in four highly saturated hues
Enameled nonstick surface and easy-grip handles
Cooks evenly and is easy to clean
Attractive design looks great on display
cons: Not as durable as higher-end braisers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is big, beautiful and heavy! I’ve been cooking and baking everything in it. Great price for such a versatile piece. No chips or quality issues with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B

customer_reviews.title: Looks really great, cooks well too.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is just outstanding. It looks and cooks great. The only downside is that on the knob it says “amazon basics” in block print. It isn’t the name I don’t like, I’m not pretending it’s something else, I just wish the design og the printing was a little more attractive. It just looks slapped on there. A minor point. Overall, fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gpwiel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for a long time comparing many different very expensive options. Instead, I ended up giving this one a try (which was much cheaper) and I am so impressed. The color is beautiful in person and it feels like a great quality product. I would compare it to the expensive brands like La Cocotte and Le Creuset. Great job amazon
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Claxon

customer_reviews.title: Color is really awful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cast iron braiser... HOWEVER, Amazon said it was white enamel, and it absolutely is NOT white. More almond or ivory..... disappointed, so I’ll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Teach

customer_reviews.title: Love cooking with this
customer_reviews.text: I really love cooking with this, you can get stuff really hot and seared... And even if it looks like it’s badly burnt, it will clean up very easily. I might have to soak it overnight but it will clean up, but be kind to the enamel and don’t scratch it up. The lid fits nice and tight and it’s really very solid and very attractive. I wish they made a smaller one that I could use for dips, it makes it a little bit easy to travel with it as this one is quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: It's all I need
customer_reviews.text: Got it two days ago. I used it to made Arroz Con Pollo tonight. It worked perfectly well.
customer_reviews.author: Shu

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase I've ever made.
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE! EVERYTHING burns to the pan. Before it's even done cooking (stove never goes higher than medium and I stir almost constantly with this pan) it burns! I wish I could get my money back and purchase a Lodge brand pan. I regret this purchase so much! The photo shows eggs cooking, and it's mostly raw, while the bottom is burning. Simply terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Cherilyn Spencer

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING sticks in this pan.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pan in hopes of getting a "healthy pan" that would work with basic cooking and not stick. Everything we tried in this pan sticks. Even bacon cooked on low, hamburger patties, stir fry veggies and we pre sprayed the pan with a cooking spray. I have NEVER been so disappointed in a pan ever
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Crazing in the enamel after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this skillet, its definitely the most expensive one I've ever purchased. This item is not easy to clean at all, after cooking in it I soaked it multiple times and after the first use it never looked clean again. Then, after only using it about five times crazing and lines appeared in the enamel on the bottom of the skillet, the reason why I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Litchfield

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a a couple months ago and was so excited about an affordable dutch oven - non toxic pan. The problem is everything sticks! It doesn't matter what cooking spray or oil I use things will stick and are really difficult to get off. Overall I am really disappointed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great price but dont expect the same quality as the French one.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Le Crueset Braiser. I use it all the time. I don't love the price tag so I gave this one a shot. The heat performance is comparable to LC. Cleanup is comparable too. But, the enamel on the outside of the pan discolored the 2nd time I washed it and in the first week, it chipped on the outside. (My LC is 30 years old and hasn't a single chip in it! ) The lid is flat instead of domed like the LC so be aware of that too. That fact alone has interfered with what I can put in it. Overall, it was a good purchase but it is not identical to the LC branded pots.
customer_reviews.author: Mz.B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Skillet!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Amazon Prime Day & got an amazing deal!! I was looking for an enamel cast iron skillet, but when I saw the prices that they typically go for, I was weary. Then I found Amazonbasics. Everything I have purchased from this Amazon brand has been amazing, including this skillet. I already put it to use and made a chicken pot pie with it! Came out perfect! I cooked the inside filling first and nothing got stuck to the pan like others have mentioned. I have no complaints & I love the blue color! Now I want to purchase the matching Amazonbasics Dutch oven pot!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: NON-STICK IT IS NOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything sticks. Its beautiful and I don't want to return it because I love it. But everything sticks to it. AND I MEAN EVERYTHING!! When you soak it comes off but thats not the point of NON STICK. I bought a cheap pan and seem to be using it more then the nice stuff which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Epps

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty pan.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to keep on my stovetop and use everyday. I had a Le Creuset but decided to give it away as a gift and use this one instead. Unfortunately one of the handles has already chipped. Not happy, will be contacting customer support to check on a replacement. Yes, I know it's not Le Creuset but used it ONCE and the handle chipped? Nope.
customer_reviews.author: Creative-Culinary Food and Cocktail Blog

customer_reviews.title: Finally a quality enamel skillet for the rest of us
customer_reviews.text: I've always had my heart set on adding Le Creuset enamel ware to my cookware collection, but my budget has other ideas. Enter Amazon Basics. I purchased the casserole skillet 5 months ago and I am very happy with it. I use it at least twice a week for all kinds of cooking from pasta dishes, quick stews, to stir frying and it is great. It holds heat very well, is durable, and is easy to clean. As with typical enamel ware, as long as you use it with non-metal utensils the finish should remain pristine. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on a discount during Prime day. Love it so much I would have gladly paid full price for it. I can cook anything in it. When it is harder to clean, like if I pan-fry steaks, I just put a little baking soda on my sponge and anything that has stuck comes right off. Love it so much I bought the Dutch oven to match
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Jent

customer_reviews.title: Burns easily
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Extremely disappointed and very surprised at the quality. It’s a coated cast iron skillet but food sticks to the bottom immediately every time. Would not recommend as not worth the price to go generic.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - small issue with chip on handle
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted this plan for a while. I was so excited to get it. I LOVE the color!! I LOVE the shape. I was disappointed it came with a chip on the underside of the handle. Not worth sending back for that - but still a little bummed it's not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset Style @ Amazon Price
customer_reviews.text: This casserole skillet is a great choice for those of us who simply can’t afford, or don’t wish to spend so much on a piece of Le Creuset cookware. I have no negatives regarding this item. It heats evenly, cooks beautifully, & cleans easily. I make sure to use silicone or bamboo utensils when cooking, & anticipate using this casserole skillet for years to come. It arrived well packaged & in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Super Heavy, right handle chipped twice.
customer_reviews.text: This pan is much heavier than i expected. This makes cooking with it more challenging than anticipated as it takes longer to heat up evenly, holds heat longer than a regular cephalon pan, and that heat adds to an increase in burner settings. It makes a good, efficient saute near impossible. (If anyone knows how to saute using a coated cast iron pan such as this one, please, please let me know!) Other wise, the right handle shipped with a small crack in the finish that has now chipped, along with another minor/ small chip on the same handle. Not sure why this happened. Everything else was/is exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.author: bookfan

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL ❣️
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and packaging was exceptional. Very heavy and sturdy product. I love it and can't wait to use it. Will provide update Ina couple of months on its durability. So far very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: SB10

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a pan aa such for years, after stopping on more than one occasion at a factory, I did get one, an Amazon Basics vs the factory from where I wanted to purchase. I love this pan, as far as I see in using it, it’s only a difference in brand I love this pan. No reasoning to believe it’s a “basic” product. I used this pan the afternoon/evening we received it,, Meat (stir fry) came together so quickly and tasteful, along with the other ingredients. Rice. Tomatoes, onion, etc. I cannot Believe I put off a purchase as this for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enamel silver & flaking
customer_reviews.text: Noticed an enamel flaw (pitted) on under side of lid but thought it was easier to use as is than return a heavy pan. Now after the first use it already has a chip on the top of lid despite careful delicate use. But more concerning after soaking in the sink the bottom of the pan has a silvery sheen to it and enamel seems to be flaking off or something also the inside is already stained (nothing was burned). Guess I should have known to go with a better brand...get what you pay for. Of course I missed the return window by a few days because I didn't get around to using it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cast iron casserole dish to cook with, but didn't want to pay for the expensive ones. I love this Amazon Basics skillet! It's heavy and cooks well. It's been easy to clean so far. I mostly use it on the stovetop, but I have done a couple of stovetop to over dishes and they've gone well. The biggest issue I have is how to store it when not using it since I'm a little limited on space. Still love it though. It would definitely make a good gift for someone who loves to cook or is setting up a new/first house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new Favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pan. It arrived quickly, in perfect shape. The color is beautiful and the size is perfect for cooking for two or a crowd. Cleans up in a breeze. I can wait to get another pan in another color to go with this gorgeous blue and the yellow dutch oven that I already have. My kitchen is a happy place!!! I can recommend this pan without hesitation. I just don't want to put it away!!! Get it...you won't be sorry!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. CHANCE

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this item . chips very easily. I have been trying to contact AMAZON customer service. So futile and aggravating. I hope someone from Amazon customer service reads this and they contact me .
customer_reviews.author: rlevine

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this for a friend for Christmas, so I did not get to see it beforehand. When I first saw it the handles were chipped pretty bad, for looks not function. An amazing item that the big LC brand would not have let out of the factory with those errors. I realize that it is a new item for them and QC is tough; I jut expected the item to be as good as all the other Amazon Basics items I have purchased in the past. Once again, only dinging it for the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking pot, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The braiser is nice, but it has a bubble in the enameled cooking area and did not get to use it, it got sent back. hesitant to re-order based on the quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: ZGR

customer_reviews.title: Problematic
customer_reviews.text: Also performs as expected. Like the shape, and of course the performance. Cost-effective alternative to Le Creuset. Happy with the purchase. Update on 9/9/19. Used a couple of times. Didn't do anything unusual. Has a chip on the enamel already. Doesn't say where the product is made. Only "Amazon Basics"
customer_reviews.author: val t.

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Simply stated- durable and looks great. Cooks perfectly, and cleans up well. Spreads heat evenly-even on electric ranges. If you don't want to spend the ton of money on that name brand, I would give this a try. I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Went to cast iron because they are healthier, in my opinion. This pan is the very versatile and I use it for almost everything. Easy to clean...sometimes soaking required, but it cleans up great. Super affordable compared to other “brands” and great quality. I was lucky to have gotten mine on prime day but I would pay full price also.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: After one time use, enamel burned off the pan. Hoping to return as defective, will update review at a later time, but disappointed so far
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet and it is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this skillet and had to have it! The color is amazing. It cooks things perfect. Heats up quick and things don't stick to it. It has been easy to clean. The only thing I wish is that they made different sizes so I could buy them all! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.... not great.
customer_reviews.text: The weight is much lighter than the classic larger ovens ... which is awesome for my elderly mother who struggles with the larger and heavier (but much better) la french Dutch oven. The color is bright and fun... but... it is just a tad cheap. If I were to purchase again ... I would spend 2x + for the quality of the la French version... or even the lodge if I were on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mcnulty

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this size/configuration because I do not have one this size/shape. I find that (after having used it) that I think I prefer something with a narrower base and taller side because a couple times, I have tried to dish things up and instead, dished it onto the stove LOL stupid me But anyway, I love how hot it get and love the colour (white) i bought.
customer_reviews.author: Serene

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is beautiful, and cooks really well, cleans nicely, and is a good value for the money. This is an update: I love this pan, it is so versatile. Also, it isn't quite as heavy and cumbersome as the lodge brand enameled cast iron I own. I have been using this daily, sometimes for two meals a day, washes up so easily, cooks evenly, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love mine! I see some other reviews say it is hard to clean but it's not at all. I have fried, boiled, baked, sauteed, and no problem cleaning. If you have to scrub too hard for your liking just heat some water up in it and stir the stuff off of the pot. I loved it so much I bought a pot to match it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great size for just two people
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for bring, braising, really anything you'd normally do in a larger plan. Perfect for two-person household.
customer_reviews.author: PALong

customer_reviews.title: Micro cracks in enamel coating
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the non-stick and easy clean up; however, micro cracks in the enamel appeared only after a few uses. I have followed all care instructions and have only used silicone or wooden utensils.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect All Purpose Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan! It is very heavy, so no scorching; wide so you can reduce sauces quickly; shallow enough to fry eggs; and deep enough to toss pasta with a sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great braiser if you overlook the chipping enamel
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. The only reason I’ve given it 3 stars is because the enamel coating has begun to chip after just a couple of uses and I’m very careful with my cookware. Other than that it’s wonderful
customer_reviews.author: sonny nicholas

customer_reviews.title: That They clean with ease.
customer_reviews.text: I have starting buying the enamel cast iron since I ruined my old cast iron. I know. They say you can't ruin them but not what I have experienced so I'm sticking (no pun intended ) with the enamel cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: gerry brockmann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skillet
customer_reviews.text: Baked a peach cobbler in the oven using this skillet. Clean up good. Very pretty in blue ombré color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best kitchen pan EVER
customer_reviews.text: So excited to have found this AmazonBasic! I have the Le Cruset version which is a workhorse in my kitchen. I have come to love the versatility of this pan so much that I gift it whenever possible but it’s not often I can afford the sticker price of the Le Cruset!!! So to find this pan- same shape, same size is so great!! I gave it my mom and it has become the primary pan in her kitchen. Can’t wait to gift this to others!! Ps. Could we have more color options?
customer_reviews.author: Serena Z. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,  better price
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Yes you need to be careful with it or it may chip. But that is standard with any enameled cast iron. The quality of these are as good as the higher priced, name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dutch oven style pan, the size is nice and big and I love that you can bake up 400 degrees too - it's pretty to display as well
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This pan is nice. Easy to clean, and so far no issues with food sticking. WAY easier to clean than a standard (non-enameled) cast iron pan. Oven safe for versatility. looks good to boot.
customer_reviews.author: zBrendon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I cooked in cast iron most all of my life and I love it you still have to cook for a lot of cowboys outside and it's absolutely lovely now with us enamel it is with the enamel it is just a pleasure and not only that it's pretty on the table too
customer_reviews.author: carol knagge

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks to pan more than normal.
customer_reviews.text: Food sticks ridiculously more than my other cast iron pans and pots, Tramotina and Lodge. I don’t have Le crueset and can’t comment on that brand. The food does come out great if I can get it out of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Objective customer

customer_reviews.title: We really love this Pan
customer_reviews.text: We loved it so much we purchased several for our family members. Does great on flat top stoves as well as goes directly in the oven. Great all around pan.
customer_reviews.author: Chester L. Husk Jr.

customer_reviews.title: As good as the reviews say it is
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how great this casserole is - the cleanup is remarkable - every time I clean it I marvel. I have a french name brand pot and this is as good if not better! I use it all the time for eggplant parmesan. I simmer the marinara for 3 hours and then add the breaded eggplant. Pop it into the oven and it's just amazing! It's a truly versatile pot.
customer_reviews.author: Kaela Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about this product but it is a great buy. My wife loves using it and no paint chip problems. Just remember that it's hand wash only and do not submerged in water and it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cookware vs my LeCreuset I’ve had forever.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! I have the set of three so far. I have a few LeCreuset crocks, and these are the AMAZING for the price!! I actually prefer these over any of my other “fancy, expensive “ ones. Wash by hand, and don’t use abrasive cleaners.. LOVE LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.author: Krizia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This item was delivered shattered in a million pieces. The enamel was like tiny pieces of glass, I cut my fingers upon opening the package. This was my first and last “Amazon Basics” purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kim watford

customer_reviews.title: Heats unevenly and chips
customer_reviews.text: Heats unevenly and burns food always in the same spot. I have used it for less than 3 months and the lid already has 4 chips. I do not leave it in the sink or put in the dishwasher. I take good care of my cookware. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Best value ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my mom’s all-time favorite pot; she uses it for everything and loves it. She couldn’t believe that I didn’t pay $300 for it, and she is thrilled with the ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: love the look and size. but my first time using it I fried potatoes and even though I used oil they stuck to the pan and was very hard to scrap up
customer_reviews.author: Donna Logan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, enamel coating chips!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The enamel coating chips the first time you use it. Do not buy. I am stuck with one and have another to give as a gift but can't because of the faulty coating. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in Philadelphia

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly
customer_reviews.text: I used this now a number of times. the heat distribution is even and it is easy to clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a month... so far its been awesome. Everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Very functional. Love the versatility of cast iron and the ease of the enameled coating. It’s heavy !!
customer_reviews.author: mick

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Came extremely dirty and chipped. The tiny chip doesn’t bother me but how disgustingly dirty it came was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime bell

customer_reviews.title: Semi Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this pot except for the lid knob. It gets very hot. Would be better with a heat resistant one.
customer_reviews.author: KC Treibs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It does not evenly cook/fry. The cover gets too hot I can’t even hold the knob.
customer_reviews.author: Applepie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it more every time I use it! Very good quality. I have one of each size. Beautiful in blue.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Arrived chipped.
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it. I returned it, as the enamel was chipped on lid and in pan.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product and excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. I've been looking for ages and stumbled across this amazon version. Its proven to be brilliant. I use it most nights and am REALLY pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S.Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I cook. A lot. I decided to go with this product because of the great reviews. I’m going to order more pieces.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nejedly

customer_reviews.title: Same high quality and performance of that expensive brand.
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan almost daily. It makes cooking so easy! Cooking for one was boring until this pan arrived. I'm inspired to cook again! And cleanup? A breeze! Seriously...why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.author: Debi H

customer_reviews.title: START COOKING!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, bought it on sale. Extremely versatile and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this skillet 🍳 it heats evenly and cooks amazingly! One of my best purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have known better. This is a great shallow Dutch oven, which is exactly what I wanted. I had an old one that was starting to chip. The old one wasn't cast iron, obviously, because this one weighs a ton. It's great in every other way, but I can barely lift it, so I fear I won't be using it as much as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great pan, difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Its a great pan, had to send back though i spent way too much time cleaning it and it would never be perfectly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: And the delivery was good and fast
customer_reviews.text: This pan I always wanted but they are to much money but I got it here for a good deal very happy for that
customer_reviews.author: Gail Perez

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a little bigger?...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I could possibly want more in regards to this product is a larger size. I believe the one I have is a little over 3 quarts and if I could have a five or 6 quart size it would allow for a little larger family.
customer_reviews.author: Milking Badger

customer_reviews.title: cast iron
customer_reviews.text: what a great price for this pan , very pretty to put on table love the red color
customer_reviews.author: Nellie D.

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to the Pricey brand-name alternative
customer_reviews.text: Really nice item. Looks great and cleans easily. Quality is comparable to Le creuset: but not quite as heavy and the enamel finish may discolor slightly vs. Le creuset. Great gift item.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly V

customer_reviews.title: This casserole is beautiful as well as useful.
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of cleaning and even temperature while cooking foods.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My mom has a brand name pan just like this. I planned to buy the same, but when it was out of stock I settled for this Amazon Basics one & I LOVE IT! Perfect. Just as good as the name brand ones, but in stock & cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dutch oven for your money
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this to replace some of her "everyday" cookware. She cooks with this dutch oven all the time and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearemnxe
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy which you would expect but so heavy won’t use it often
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I would have bought a different brand but I have so many credits from Amazon. This was the only thing I could find that I wanted. Is this not as good as other cast iron pans I've had. I really wanted to like this more.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Such an excellent pot
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pot I use for cooking now. It’s excellent! Best part is how easy it is to clean. After several recipes cooked in it, it’s still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor West

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality. Love the price. So far compares favorably to my Le Creuset pots.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Versatile pan.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan and use it several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the lake

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Better than Le Creuset...price was amazing and cooks to perfection!!
customer_reviews.author: Wind Song

customer_reviews.title: oh yeah
customer_reviews.text: i love it- there is the weight issue but it is necessary
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Casserole Skillet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice skillet. I love this skillet, I use it alot. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Antone

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for family meals, the heat distribution is great. No hot spots. Also the coating makes no food stick. Only issue is that some foods tend to leave very stubborn stains. A magic eraser/normal sponge quickly removes them though. Very happy with purchase, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Delicious meals and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Love my enameled cast iron. Came in perfect condition and I use it a few times a week. I love cooking in it and my family always eats everything I make. Easy to clean and perfect addition in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Grant

customer_reviews.title: Live it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan, beautiful look & easy to clean. Great price

customer_reviews.title: You will like this
customer_reviews.text: Attractive to use. Easy to handle. Looks nice on burst or table

customer_reviews.title: Must have in every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was sad it chipped almost immediately after accidentally bumping it ever so slightly on the sink while cleaning... I do enjoy cooking with it and have received compliments from family.

customer_reviews.title: Great cook ware
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and it looks like it's of good quality.Clean up is a breeze.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite pan - use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go to pan for making dinner. I pretty much use it daily. It’s so solid and heavy and goes from the stove into the oven. Really glad I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skillet so I could brown then braise in the oven and it works GREAT. I'm happy I found this one instead of spending hundreds of dollars on the fancy brand.

customer_reviews.title: Great cook’s pan
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cook’s pan. Cleans up in a flash. Distributes heats evenly.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this casserole dish. It's larger than I expected and I definitely had to move things around in my cupboards to find it a home, but it's worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Love this!  Stylish
customer_reviews.text: As a chef this is one of my go to items are use all the time. It is very functional and it has a wonderful display finish for the food

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Enameled Cast Iron Covered Casserole Skillet, 3.3-Quart, Blue
product_meta.description: Size:3.3-Quart| Color:BlueEnamel doesn't have non-stick function
feature_bullets: Casserole cast iron skillet in blue with loop side handles for easy transport; oven safe to 400 degree Fahrenheit
Cast iron for even heat distribution and retention; Enamel doesn't have non-stick function
Always use hot-pads, oven mitts, or potholders while moving or removing cast iron cookware on or from the stove or oven.
